original_text: And we bring you the good news that what God promised to the fathers,
korean_text: 우리도 조상들에게 주신 약속을 너희에게 전파하노니

sentences.original_text: And we bring you the good news
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 우리는 여러분에게 좋은 소식을 전합니다

sentences.original_text: that what God promised to the fathers
